abstract.t: This document defines the 'XML2RFC' version 2 vocabulary; an XML- based language used for writing Internet-Drafts and RFCs. This vocabulary is used for current processing of XML into RFCs. A future version of this vocabulary will be used as the canonical version of RFCs.Editorial Note (To be removed by RFC Editor) Discussion of this draft takes place on the XML2RFC mailing list (xml2rfc@ietf.org), which has its home page at <https://www.ietf.org/mailman/listinfo/xml2rfc>.
